ighberry Home was a large manse located in the Lower City of Baldurs Gatein the late 15 century DR.
thumb|A view of Highberry Home from the alleyway.|460x460px
Highberry Home stood next-door to Bonecloaks Apothecary, north of the Sorcerous Sundries shop in the Heapside neighborhood of Baldurs Gate.The games city map is representative and in no way accurate to the actual layout of Baldurs Gate. This article makes an educated guess that Highberry Home is located on the same plaza as Sorcerous Sundries, both found on the city map. Its position matches the plazas northwestern block, which is just two buildings the shop and the spacious Highberry family home.
Highberry Home was a spacious three-story building with a big open space used for festivals. Its first floor was a large wine cellar.
In the , Highberry Home hosted a fashionable wine festival filled with guests, servers, and gossip. The hosts – gnome spouses Cora Highberry and Roger Highberry, wow busy mingling with the guests, their wards – orphans Molly and Timmy, inside the manse, all unaware that mistress Cora was marked for death by a Bhaalist serial killer Dolor and his special poison, Karabasans Gift. It was unrecorded if the assassination attempt on Cora Highberry was successful and if the festival was ruined by Dolor and his doppelganger murderers.
